name: 黃馨瑩
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟托福測驗及學術英語(Academic English)所需具備的能力，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場上或英語學術環境中的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1.　　　　Orientation
Week 2.
Academic lecture: key differences between the language of lecturing and the language of writing
Week 3.　　　　Academic lecture: Note-Taking Basics
Week 4.　　　　Speaking: Independent Task
Week 5.　　　　Skill Focus: Listening for Main Idea
Week 6.　　　　Skill Focus: Listening for Details (1)
Week 7.　　　　Skill Focus: Listening for Details (2)
Week 8.　　　　Speaking: Integrated Task
Week 9.　　　　Midterm
Week 10.
Skill Focus: Identifying and Using Rhetorical Structure (1)
Week 11.
Skill Focus: Identifying and Using Rhetorical Structure (2)
Week 12.        Speaking: Independent Task
Week 13.　　Academic lecture: Noting Numbers & Statistics
Week 14.　　Skill Focus: Using Context Clues
Week 15.　　Speaking: Integrated Task
Week 16.　　Skill Focus: Making Inference (1)
Week 17.　　Skill Focus: Making Inference (2)
Week 18.　　Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. Check-in Quiz 單字小考: 10%
2. Weekly Assignment 每週作業: 10%
3. Listening Exercise 聽力練習: 15%
4. Attendance and Participation 課堂發言及參與: 15%
5. Mid-term and Final Exam期中&期末評量: 50%
materials: NorthStar: Building Skills for the TOEFL iBT (High Intermediate) by Helen Sol?rzano
